name: Region Flyers
about: Region Flyers is an FAA-approved Part 141 Flight School, renowned for its exceptional flight training programs. Our experienced and professional staff consists of hand-picked Certified Flight Instructors, ensuring students receive the highest quality instruction. We offer comprehensive training for various certificates and ratings, including Private Pilot, all within a structured and supportive environment. Whether you're flying for fun or aspiring to a professional career, Region Flyers provides the resources and expertise to help you achieve your aviation goals. With a commitment to safety and excellence, we are dedicated to helping you take to the skies with confidence.
services:
["Ground School
Intro Flight
Airline Transport Pilot ATP
Commercial
Flight Instructor CFI
Flight Instructor Instrument CFII
Multi Engine Instructor MEI
Private Pilot

Instrument"]
